name: Twice-baked Stuffed Potatoes
description: Dare to compare? Popular steakhouse twice-baked potatoes can pack a fattening punch! Save over 200 calories, 10 g fat and 400 mg sodium with this lean and light recipe – all the cheesy, herby flavours without the fat and added sodium. Shake on Better Than Bacon Topper for even more of an authentic, restaurant experience from the coziness of your home.

ingredients.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or 3 Onion Dip Mix

preparation: Scrub potatoes and pierce several times with a fork. Place in Multipurpose Steamer and microwave for 5–7 min, until easily pierced with a fork.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and carefully scoop out insides, leaving a 1⁄4” thick shell.
Mash potato with sour cream, dip mix, cheese, Sea Salt and Pepper. Spoon back into potato skins.
Arrange stuffed potatoes in an ovenproof baking dish and bake for 15–20 minutes.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
